  1. # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
  2. from contextlib import contextmanager
  3. from tempfile import mkdtemp
  4. import os
  5. import random
  6. import shutil
  7. import stat
  10. @contextmanager
  11. def temp_dir():
  12. name = make_temp_dir()
  13. yield name
  14. shutil.rmtree(name)
  16. def make_temp_dir():
  17. if os.path.exists('/dev/shm/'):
  18. if os.stat('/dev/shm').st_mode & stat.S_IWGRP:
  19. dirname = 'django-cms-tests-%s' % random.randint(1,1000000)
  20. path = os.path.join('/dev/shm', dirname)
  21. while os.path.exists(path):
  22. dirname = 'django-cms-tests-%s' % random.randint(1,1000000)
  23. path = os.path.join('/dev/shm', dirname)
  24. os.mkdir(path)
  25. return path
  26. return mkdtemp()
